title: 33. What Do a Full Moon, the Super Bowl, and Tax Day Have in Common?
description: Tax deadlines can stress us out. But do they also influence our conscious — and subconscious — behavior? Bapu Jena looks at why, with our health, timing is often everything.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Tax deadlines can stress us out. But do they also influence our conscious — and subconscious — behavior? Bapu Jena looks at why, with our health, timing is often everything.
